GR14krdipc_u:647: evaṃ oṃ namo bhagavate viṣṇave sarva-bhūtātmane vāsudevāya sarvātma-saṃyoga-yoga-padma-pīṭhātmane nama iti siddham |
GR14krdipc_u:649: namo bhagavate brūyād viṣṇave ca padaṃ vadet |
GR14krdipc_u:652: pīṭhātmane hṛd-anto 'yaṃ mantras tārādir īritaḥ || iti |
GR14krdipc_u:654: oṃ namaḥ padam ābhāṣya tathā bhagavate-padam |
GR14krdipc_u:655: vāsudevāya ity uktvā sarvātmeti padaṃ tathā ||
GR14krdipc_u:656: saṃyoga-yogety uktvā ca tathā pīṭhātmane padam |
GR14krdipc_u:662: varṇaiḥ paramaṃ jyotir anuttamaṃ hares tat // Krd_1.46 //
GR14krdipc_u:664: vyāpayyety ārabhya vidhiḥ samīritaḥ kare ity antaṃ vakṣyamāṇa-prakāreṇa mantra-varṇair mantrātmakaṃ
GR14krdipc_u:665: mantra-svarūpaṃ vidhāya kṛtvā ābhyāṃ karābhyāṃ sakalaṃ pūrvoktaṃ
GR14krdipc_u:669: tan-mantra-varṇaṃ hareḥ kṛṣṇasya paramaṃ tejaḥ-svarūpam ity arthaḥ |
GR14krdipc_u:670: kīdṛśaṃ ? punaḥ anuttamaṃ nāsty uttamaṃ yasmāt tathety arthaḥ |
GR14krdipc_u:673: hṛdaya-paṅkaja-sthaṃ harer anuttamaṃ jyotis tejaḥ sakalaṃ vidadhīta
GR14krdipc_u:674: ṣaḍ-aṅga-nyāsena sāvayavaṃ kuryād iti laghu-dīpikā-kāraḥ || KrdC_1.46 ||
GR14krdipc_u:677: karayor yugalaṃ vidhāyety ādinā sūcitaṃ mantram uddhartum ādau gopāla-mantreṣv api maulībhūtau daśākṣarāṣṭādaśākṣarau prathamaṃ
GR14krdipc_u:685: prathitaḥ khyāto 'nubhāvaḥ prabhāvo yasya tathā tam |
GR14krdipc_u:688: kimbhūtair munibhiḥ ? akṣīṇeti akṣīṇaḥ sa-pūrṇaḥ puṇya-nicayaḥ sukṛta-samūho yeṣāṃ tathā taiḥ
GR14krdipc_u:689: punaḥ kīdṛśam ? pakṣīti pakṣīndro garuḍaḥ sa eva ketuḥ cihnaṃ yasya sa
GR14krdipc_u:692: vastv iti vasu dhanaṃ tathā ca puruṣārtha-catuṣṭaya-pradam ity arthaḥ |
GR14krdipc_u:699: punaḥ kīdṛśam ? abodheti abodho mithyā-jñāna-rūpaḥ sa eva tūla-pracayaḥ |
GR14krdipc_u:700: tatra jvalano vahnir iva taṃ samastājñāna-nāśakam ity arthaḥ ? punaḥ kīdṛśam ? narāṇāṃ sādhakānāṃ vāg-adhipatya-daṃ vāgaiśvarya-pradam |
GR14krdipc_u:704: ca apamṛtyur akāla-maraṇaṃ graho nava-graha-janitāniṣṭaṃ rogo
GR14krdipc_u:705: vāta-pittādi-janita-śarīra-dausthyam evam ādīnām aśubhādīnāṃ nivāraṇe eko 'dvitīyo hetuḥ kāraṇam || KrdC_2.2 ||
GR14krdipc_u:712: salila-plavane toyam antaraṇe sukha-santaraṇa-dātāraṃ saptir hayaḥ tathā
GR14krdipc_u:718: balaṃ śarīra-sāmarthyaṃ vīryaṃ śukraṃ prabhāvo vā, śauryaṃ parābhibhāvakaṃ tejaḥ, eteṣāṃ nicayaḥ samūhaḥ |
GR14krdipc_u:723: dedīpyamāna-varṇa-śobheti kaścit subhagatvaṃ samasta-lokādarakatvam eteṣāṃ kartāraṃ dātāram ity arthaḥ |
GR14krdipc_u:725: brahmāṇḍa-koṭir yena tathā taṃ saṃsāra-mohakam ity arthaḥ |
GR14krdipc_u:730: punaḥ kiṃ bahunā, atra jagati akhiladaṃ samastābhīṣṭa-pradam
GR14krdipc_u:734: śūlī saurir bālo balānuja-dvayam athākṣara-catuṣṭayam // Krd_2.5 //
GR14krdipc_u:736: tad-dayitākṣara-yugmaṃ tad-uparigas tv evam uddharen mantram // Krd_2.6 //
GR14krdipc_u:737: śārṅgī ga-kāraḥ kīdṛśo 'yaṃ sottaradanta uttara-danta-paṅktau nyasyamānaḥ
GR14krdipc_u:738: uttara-danta o-kāras tena sahita etena prathamākṣaram uddhṛtaḥ |
GR14krdipc_u:741: kīdṛśo 'yaṃ vāmākṣi-yuk vāmākṣi caturtha-svaraḥ tena sahita etena dvitīyākṣaram uddhṛtam akṣara-catuṣkaṃ krameṇa punaḥ kathyate śūlī
GR14krdipc_u:742: ja-kāraḥ bālo ba-kāraḥ balānuja-dvayaṃ saṃyukta-la-kāra-dvayaṃ lla iti svarūpam ity akṣara-catuṣkam uddhṛtam śūra-turīyaḥ śūrasya pa-kārasya
GR14krdipc_u:744: kīdṛśo 'yaṃ sānana-vṛttaḥ ānana-vṛttenākāreṇa saha vartate iti
GR14krdipc_u:745: sānana-vṛttaḥ ayaṃ ca saptamaḥ syād mantrasya saptamo bhavatīty arthaḥ |
GR14krdipc_u:747: tathā ca mantrasyāṣṭamo varṇo ya iti boddhavyaḥ |
GR14krdipc_u:749: tad-dayitākṣara-yugalaṃ svāheti svarūpam ity akṣara-dvayam uddhṛtam ||
GR14krdipc_u:751: prakāśito daśākṣaro manus tv ayaṃ madhu-dviṣaḥ |
GR14krdipc_u:755: śrī-gopāla-kṛṣṇa-caraṇābja-yugale yā bhaktir ārādhyatvena jñānaṃ tat samṛddhikāraka ity arthaḥ || KrdC_2.7 ||
GR14krdipc_u:757: nārado munir amuṣya kīrtitaś chanda uktam ṛṣibhir virāḍ iti |
GR14krdipc_u:760: amuṣya pūrvokta-mantrasya muniḥ ṛṣir nāradaḥ kīrtitaḥ kathitaḥ |
GR14krdipc_u:766: etena ṛṣy-ādīnāṃ śirasi rasanāyāṃ hṛdi krameṇa nyāsaḥ kārya iti sūcitaṃ prapañca-sāre |
GR14krdipc_u:770: śrī-gopāla-kṛṣṇāya devatāyai namaḥ hṛdi ity evambhūtaḥ |
GR14krdipc_u:772: evaṃ chando-devatayor api yojyam iti kecit ||
GR14krdipc_u:782: amuṣya iha śāstre aṅgāni pañca kathitāni |
GR14krdipc_u:783: kāni tāni ? tatrāha hṛdaye natir iti |
GR14krdipc_u:784: hṛdaye natir namaḥ-padaṃ śirasi pāvaka-priyā svāheti sa-vaṣaṭ
GR14krdipc_u:786: hum api varmaṇi sthitaṃ varmaṇi kavace hum api padaṃ sthitam ity arthaḥ |
GR14krdipc_u:787: sa-phaḍ astraṃ phaṭ-pada-sahitam astram ity arthaḥ |
GR14krdipc_u:788: ity anena prakāreṇa sa-caturthi yathā syāt tathaivam
GR14krdipc_u:789: aṅga-pañcakam uditaṃ kathitaṃ caturthyā ca hṛdayādīnāṃ yogaḥ kāryaḥ |
GR14krdipc_u:792: mukha-vṛttam ā-kāraḥ vi iti su iti svarūpam etaiḥ pratyekam upapannaiḥ sambaddhaīh trailokya-rakṣaṇa-yujāpi trailokya-rakṣaṇaṃ yunaktīti tad-yug
GR14krdipc_u:793: etādṛśena cakreṇa api-śabdāc cakrair iti vibhidyānvayaḥ kāryaḥ |
GR14krdipc_u:794: tathā ca cakreṇeti asurāntakākhya-pūrveṇa cakreṇety arthaḥ |
GR14krdipc_u:796: punaḥ kīdṛśaiḥ vibhakti-yuktaiḥ ? caturthī-yuktais tasyā eva prakṛtatvād
GR14krdipc_u:797: etasyāpi padasya vibhidyānvayaḥ kāryaḥ dṛśor yadi iti yadi kvacin mantre dṛśor nyāso 'sti tadā tatra vauṣaḍ iti uditaṃ kathitam |
GR14krdipc_u:798: atra jvālā-cakrāyety api yojyam iti laghu-dīpikā-kāraḥ |
GR14krdipc_u:804: jvālā-cakrāya svāhā netra-dvayāya vauṣaṭ asurāntaka-cakrāya svāhā astrāya phaḍ iti aṅgulīṣv aṅga-mantra-nyāse tu tat-tad-aṅga-mantrānte
GR14krdipc_u:805: aṅguṣṭhābhyāṃ namaḥ tarjanībhyāṃ svāhā ity ādi yojyam |
GR14krdipc_u:806: āgamāntare hrīṃ aṅguṣṭhābhyāṃ namaḥ hrīṃ tarjanībhyāṃ svāhā |
GR14krdipc_u:808: tenāṅguṣṭhādiṣu hṛdayāya namaḥ ity ādi-prayogāś cintyāḥ |
GR14krdipc_u:810: anye tu yathā-śrutāṅga-mantrasyaiva nyāsair aṅgulīṣv atideśān āhur ācyāryāḥ ||
GR14krdipc_u:816: mantrārṇair mantrākṣarir namo 'ntaṃ yathā syād evam aṅgānāṃ daśakam udīritaṃ kathitaṃ kīdṛśair upeta-candra-khaṇḍaiḥ sānusvāraiḥ sthānāny āhuḥ-hṛdayaṃ śīrṣaṃ mastakaṃ tat-paścāt śikhā prasiddhā tanutraṃ kavacaṃ astraṃ daśa-dikṣu pārśva-yugala-kaṭi-pṛṣṭha-mūrdha-sahitaṃ pūrvoktam ity arthaḥ |
GR14krdipc_u:818: prayogas tu goṃ hṛdayāya nama iti pīṃ śirase svāhā ity ādi || KrdC_2.11 ||
GR14krdipc_u:825: asya mantrasya pūrvoktasya sa-śakti-śakty-ādi-sahitaṃ bījaṃ vakṣye bījam
GR14krdipc_u:828: punaḥ kīdṛśaḥ ? vāma-netra-pradīptaḥ vāma-netraṃ caturtha-svaras tat-sahitaḥ |
GR14krdipc_u:829: punaḥ kīdṛśaḥ ? sa-pradyumnaḥ pradyumno binduḥ tat-sahitaḥ tathā cakrīm iti siddhaṃ bhavati
GR14krdipc_u:831: ayam eva prādyumno mantra ity arthaḥ |
GR14krdipc_u:839: kimbhūtaḥ ? medo va-kāraḥ vaktra-vṛttam ā-kāraḥ ābhyām upetaḥ sambaddhaḥ tathā pautrī ha-kāraḥ
GR14krdipc_u:841: tathā ca svāheti siddham asau yugārṇo varṇa-dvayātmikā śaktiḥ proktā tatheyaṃ vahner vallabhā kimbhūtā kāmadā ākāṅkṣita-pradā |
GR14krdipc_u:846: kṛṣṇaṃ prakṛtir ity ukto durgādhiṣṭhātṛ-devatā // Krd_2.14 //

GR14krdipc_u:848: prakṛtir mūla-kāraṇaṃ mantrotpādakaḥ mantra-svarūpa ity arthaḥ |
GR14krdipc_u:851: gopāyeti sakalam idaṃ gopāyati paraṃ pumāṃsam iti gopī |

GR14krdipc_u:862: yaḥ kārya-kāraṇeśaḥ paramātmety acyutaikatāsya manoḥ // Krd_2.17 //

GR14krdipc_u:870: paramātmane svātmānaṃ jīvaika-svarūpaṃ gamayāmi samarpayāmi tad-ātmakatāṃ
GR14krdipc_u:876: kārya-kāraṇayor jana-prakṛtyor īśaḥ svāmī adhiṣṭhātā tathā paramātmā nirupādhi-caitanyatvāc cety anena prakāreṇāsyopāsakasyācyutaikatācyutena
GR14krdipc_u:880: tasya svānanyasya svāmī vallabha iti ha nirdiṣṭaḥ // Krd_2.18 //
GR14krdipc_u:881: athavā gopījana iti śabdena sakala-viśva-rakṣaṇa-śakti-samudāyaḥ kathyate
GR14krdipc_u:886: svāmī niyantā āśrayo vallabha iti hasya sphuṭaṃ nirdiṣṭa udita ity arthaḥ |
GR14krdipc_u:889: tu-avana-śakti-samudāyaḥ avanaṃ sthitiḥ tatra kāraṇa-bhūtānāṃ śaktīnāṃ samudāyaḥ samūhaḥ jagat-pāliny-ādi-gaṇaḥ
GR14krdipc_u:891: jagat-pālinīty ādyāḥ proktās tāḥ sthitaye kalā iti tasya svāmī nāyaka ity arthaḥ || KrdC_2.18
GR14krdipc_u:893: athavā vraja-yuvatīnāṃ dayitāya juhomi māṃ madīyam apīty arpayet samastaṃ brahmaṇi sugaṇe samasta-sampattyai // Krd_2.19 //
GR14krdipc_u:894: gopī-jano gopāṅganā-janas tasya vallabho niratiśaya-prema-viṣayaḥ tasmai
GR14krdipc_u:895: vraja-yuvatīnāṃ gopa-ramaṇīnāṃ dayitāya hṛdayānanda-dāyine svāhā juhomi |
GR14krdipc_u:896: kiṃ māṃ svātmānaṃ madīyam api ātmīya-suhṛd-ādikam api ity anena prakāreṇa
GR14krdipc_u:897: sa-guṇe brahmaṇi saṃsāra-pravartake parameśvareśvare sarvaṃ samarpayet |
GR14krdipc_u:901: kṛṣ-śabdaḥ sattārtho ṇaś cānandātmakas tataḥ kṛṣṇaḥ |
GR14krdipc_u:911: kṛṭ ṇaś ca ṇa-kāraś ca ānandātmaka ānanda-vācī |
GR14krdipc_u:912: nanda ānanda iti dhātor eka-deśa-grahaṇād iti kaścit |
GR14krdipc_u:914: 'trādarśaṃ ādyaci-kṛte ca kṛṣṇaḥ sad-ānanda ity arthaḥ |
GR14krdipc_u:918: bhaktādi-karṣaṇād iti pāṭhe ādi-śabdenābhakta-grahaṇaṃ bhaktasya karṣaṇaṃ sva-sthāna-nayanam
GR14krdipc_u:925: vācakatvāt jñāna-vācakatvāt tena jñānenopalabhyate prāpyate jñāyate iti govindaḥ |
GR14krdipc_u:926: vid lābhe ity asya dhātoḥ prakārāntaram āha-vettīti |
GR14krdipc_u:930: gāṃ śabda-rāśiṃ śabda-samudāyaṃ mātṛkāṃ vettīti govindaḥ |
GR14krdipc_u:933: athavā gāva indriyāṇi teṣāṃ vicāraṇād viśeṣeṣu
GR14krdipc_u:936: | tathā ca śrutiḥ-paśavo div-pādaś catuṣpādaś ca iti |
GR14krdipc_u:937: teṣāṃ viśeṣeṣu puṇya-pāpeṣu cāraṇāt pravartanād govindaḥ |
GR14krdipc_u:946: ete abhikhye nāmanī kṛṣṇa-govindākhye anukrameṇa turya-vibhaktyā pratyekaṃ
GR14krdipc_u:948: manmatha-bījāt paścāt kāma-bījānantaram atha ced yadi syātāṃ bhavataḥ tadā
GR14krdipc_u:954: punaḥ kīdṛśaḥ ? vāñchitasya cintā-mātreṇābhīṣṭa-prada ity arthaḥ || KrdC_2.22 ||
GR14krdipc_u:956: pūrva-pradiṣṭe muni-devate 'sya chandas tu gāyatram uśanti santaḥ |
GR14krdipc_u:957: aṅgāni mantrārṇa-catuṣkair varmāvasānāni yugārṇam astram // Krd_2.23 //
GR14krdipc_u:961: aṅgānīti mantrārṇa-catuś catuṣkair mantra-sambandhi-varṇānāṃ caturbhiś caturbhir akṣaraiḥ kṛtvā ṣoḍaśākṣarair varmāvasānāni kavacāntāni catvāry aṅgāni bhavanti |
GR14krdipc_u:962: avaśiṣṭaṃ yugārṇam varṇa-dvayam astrākhyam aṅgaṃ bhavati
GR14krdipc_u:963: | prayogaś ca-klīṃ kṛṣṇāya hṛdayāya namaḥ govindāya śirase svāhā,
GR14krdipc_u:964: gopī-jana-śikhāyai vaṣaṭ, vallabhāya kavacāya huṃ, svāhā astrāya phaṭ ||
GR14krdipc_u:966: bījaṃ śaktiḥ prakṛtir viniyogaś cāpi pūrvavad amuṣya |
GR14krdipc_u:967: pūrvatarasya manorathaṃ kathayāmi nyāsam akhila-siddhi-karam // Krd_2.24
GR14krdipc_u:968: amuṣyāsya mantrasya bījaṃ śaktiḥ prakṛtir viniyogaḥ pūrva-mantre yāni bījādīni kathitāni tāny atrāpi jñātavyānīty arthaḥ |
GR14krdipc_u:970: daśākṣara-gopāla-mantrasyākhila-siddhi-karaṃ samasta-siddhi-dāyakaṃ nyāsaṃ kathayāmīti pratijñā adhunā nyāsa-kramaṃ daśārṇasya kathayati-vyāpayyeti |
GR14krdipc_u:971: vyāpayyārtho hastayor mantram antar bāhye pārśve tāra-ruddhaṃ budhena |
GR14krdipc_u:974: atho 'nantaraṃ budhena paṇḍitena varṇair mūla-mantrākṣarair nyāso vidheyaḥ kāryaḥ |
GR14krdipc_u:975: kiṃ kṛtvā ? mūla-mantraṃ hastayor antar madhye tathā hastayor eva
GR14krdipc_u:976: bāhye pṛṣṭhe tathā hastayor eva pārśve vyāpayya vyāpakatayā vinyasyety arthaḥ |
GR14krdipc_u:980: bindūttaṃsair binduḥ śiro 'laṅkāro yeṣāṃ te tathā sānusvārair ity arthaḥ |
GR14krdipc_u:981: punaḥ kīdṛśaiḥ ? hārda-hṛdyair hārdena namaḥ-padena hṛdyair manojñaiḥ sahitair ity arthaḥ
GR14krdipc_u:982: prayogaś ca-oṃ goṃ oṃ namaḥ dakṣāṅguṣṭha-parva-traye
GR14krdipc_u:983: oṃ pīṃ oṃ namaḥ tarjanyām ity ādi |
GR14krdipc_u:984: oṃ llaṃ oṃ namo vāma-kaniṣṭhikāyām ity ādi || KrdC_2.25 ||
GR14krdipc_u:986: śākhāsu trīṇi parvāṇy adhi daśasu pṛthag-dakṣiṇāṅguṣṭha-pūrvaṃ
GR14krdipc_u:987: vāmāṅgaṣṭhāvasānaṃ nyasatu vimala-dhīḥ sṛṣṭir uktā karasthā |
GR14krdipc_u:989: dakṣāṅguṣṭhāntikaitat trayam api sṛjati sthity-upetaṃ ca kāryam //
GR14krdipc_u:990: daśasu śākhāsu aṅgulīṣu pṛthak kṛtvaikaṃ trīṇi parvāṇi adhi parva-trayaṃ
GR14krdipc_u:991: vyāpya, tripāṭhinas tu trīṇi parvāṇi iti parva-traye adhīti upari aṅguly-agre ca pṛthag ekaikaśaḥ |
GR14krdipc_u:992: tathā ca prathama-parvaṇi oṃ dvitīye oṃ
GR14krdipc_u:993: tṛtīye oṃ aṅguly-agre namaḥ iti evam anyatrāpīty āhuḥ |
GR14krdipc_u:995: vāmāṅgaṣṭhāvasānaṃ vāmāṅgaṣṭho 'vasāne nyāsānte yathā syād evaṃ
GR14krdipc_u:997: evaṃ ca karasthā sṛṣṭir uktā kare
GR14krdipc_u:1001: vāma-kare 'py aṅguṣṭhādika-niṣṭhāsv aṅguliṣu nyased ayaṃ sthiti-nyāsa
GR14krdipc_u:1003: saṃhṛtir vāma-pūrvā dakṣeti saṃhṛtiḥ saṃhāraḥ vāmāṅguṣṭha-pūrvā
GR14krdipc_u:1006: sṛṣṭi-sthiti-saṃhārātmakaṃ trayam api sṛjati sthity-upetaṃ kāryaṃ ca sṛṣṭy-ādi-nyāsa-pañcakaṃ kāryam ity arthaḥ || KrdC_2.26 ||
GR14krdipc_u:1009: tad-aṅga-pañcakaṃ tathā vidhiḥ samīritaḥ kare // Krd_2.27 //
GR14krdipc_u:1010: tatas tad-anantaraṃ sthiti-kramāt sthiti-nyāsa-krameṇa daśasv aṅgulīṣu budhaḥ paṇḍitaḥ daśāṅgakāni pūrvokta-mantra-daśāṅgāni vinyaset |
GR14krdipc_u:1011: tad-aṅga-pañcakaṃ tatheti tathā tena prakāreṇa sthiti-krameṇa
GR14krdipc_u:1012: tad-aṅga-pañcakaṃ purvokta-pañcakaṃ pūrvoktāṅga-pañcakaṃ daśasu aṅgulīṣu vinyaset |
GR14krdipc_u:1014: evaṃ cāyaṃ vidhiḥ prakāraḥ kare hasta-dvaye samīritaḥ kathita ity arthaḥ || KrdC_2.27 ||
GR14krdipc_u:1015: mātṛkā-nyāsa-viśeṣaṃ darśayan tattva-nyāsaṃ ca krameṇāha-puṭitair iti |
GR14krdipc_u:1016: puṭitair manunātha mātṛārṇair abhivinyasya sa-bindubhiḥ purovat |
GR14krdipc_u:1019: athāntara-manunā daśārṇena puṭitair mātṛkākṣaraiḥ sa-bindubhiḥ sānusvāraiḥ purovat pūrvavad yathā pūrvaṃ lalāṭādiṣu nyāsa evam abhivinyasya anu paścān mātṛkā-nyāsa-viśeṣa-karaṇānantaraṃ vakṣyamāṇāni daśa-tattvāni
GR14krdipc_u:1030: asau manu-varyaḥ manu-śreṣṭhaḥ saṃhṛtau saṃhāra-nyāse anugato yathaivāsti tathaiva sṛṣṭi-mārge sṛṣṭi-kara-nyāse pratiyāto bhavet tad-viparīto bhavet
GR14krdipc_u:1032: eṣāṃ tattvānāṃ khalu niścayena uddhṛtir uddhāraḥ pūrvoktavad yathā pūrvam ukta-tattva-nyāse
GR14krdipc_u:1034: bhūyaḥ parāya ca tad-āhvayam ātmane ca naty-antam uddharatu tattva-manūn
GR14krdipc_u:1037: nyāsa-sambandhi-tattva-nāma-kathanaṃ tat-sthāna-kathanaṃ ca karomīty arthaḥ || KrdC_2.29
GR14krdipc_u:1039: mahī-salila-pāvakānilaviyanti garvo mahān punaḥ prakṛti-puruṣau para imāni tattvāny atha
GR14krdipc_u:1040: padāndhu-hṛdayāsyakāny adhi tu pañca madhye dvayaṃ trayaṃ sakala-gaṃ tato nyasatu tad-viparyāsataḥ mahī pṛthivī |
GR14krdipc_u:1048: paraś ca imāni pṛthivy-ādīni tattvāni tattva-pada-vācyāni |
GR14krdipc_u:1058: adhi saptamy-arthe madhye hṛdaye tattva-dvayaṃ trayaṃ
GR14krdipc_u:1062: pṛthivy-ātmane namaḥ iti pāda-dvaye ity ārabhya oṃ hāṃ namaḥ parāya
GR14krdipc_u:1063: paramātmane namaḥ ity antaḥ saṃhāraḥ oṃ hāṃ namaḥ parāya paramātmane namaḥ ity ārabhya oṃ goṃ namaḥ parāya pṛthivy-ātmane namaḥ pāda-dvaye iti
GR14krdipc_u:1065: sṛṣṭi-nyāse trayaṃ sarva-śarīre, mahad-ahaṅkārau hṛdi ākāśaḥ śirasi |
GR14krdipc_u:1068: kecit tu tattva-padāntar-bhāvena nyāsam icchanti tac cintyam ||
GR14krdipc_u:1071: kāryo 'nyṣv api sadbhir gopāla-manuṣu jhaṭiti phala-siddhyai // Krd_2.31
GR14krdipc_u:1072: ayaṃ proktaḥ kathito nyāsaḥ sadbhiḥ paṇḍitaiḥ anyeṣv api gopāla-mantreṣu
GR14krdipc_u:1075: punaḥ kīdṛśaḥ ? tattva-daśaka-parikptaḥ tattvānāṃ daśakaṃ tattva-daśakaṃ tena parikpta udghāṭita ity arthaḥ |
GR14krdipc_u:1081: triśo mūrdhany akṣṇoḥ śrutyor ghrāṇe mukha-hṛdaya-jaṭhara-śiva-jānupatsu tathākṣarāṇi // athānantaraṃ dorbhyāṃ hastābhyāṃ dhruva-puṭitam praṇava-puṭitaṃ manu-varaṃ
GR14krdipc_u:1082: mantra-śreṣṭhaṃ daśākṣaraṃ gopāla-mantram ākeśād āpādaṃ keśādi-pāda-paryantaṃ triśaḥ sva-dehe vinyased iti vidyādharācārya-tripāṭhi-prabhṛtayaḥ |
GR14krdipc_u:1083: eteṣāṃ mata ākeśād āpādad iti pāṭhaḥ |
GR14krdipc_u:1089: mūrdhni cakṣuṣor ubhaya-netre ekam evākṣaraṃ śrutayoḥ karṇayoḥ atrāpy -ekam eva ghrāṇe nāsā-yugme tatrāpy ekam eva mukhaṃ hṛdayaṃ jaṭharaṃ śivaṃ liṅgam jānu-dvaye ekaṃ, pāda-dvaye ekam eteṣu daśasu sthāneṣu daśākṣarāṇi vinyased ity arthaḥ || KrdC_2.32 ||
GR14krdipc_u:1090: uktā sṛṣṭiḥ śiṣṭair eṣā sthitir api munibhir abhihitā hṛdādi-mukhāntikā |
GR14krdipc_u:1091: saṃhāro 'ṅghry-ādi-mūrdhāntas tritayam iti viracayec ca sṛṣṭim anu sthitim // Krd_2.33
GR14krdipc_u:1092: śiṣṭair āgama-jñair eṣā sṛṣṭir uktety arthaḥ |
GR14krdipc_u:1094: 'pi munibhir nāradādibhir hṛdayādi-mukhāntikā abhihitā hṛdayam ārabhya
GR14krdipc_u:1098: tatra mantrākṣarāṇi pratilomena deyānītīdaṃ tritayaṃ viracayatu anu paścād etat tritaya-karaṇānantaraṃ punaḥ sṛṣṭim sthitim ca viracayatu |
GR14krdipc_u:1099: tathā ca pañca nyāsāḥ kāryā ity arthaḥ |
GR14krdipc_u:1100: prayogas tu goṃ namaḥ pīṃ namaḥ ity ādi ||33||
GR14krdipc_u:1101: yeṣām āśramiṇāṃ yad-anto nyāsas tad darśayati -nyāsa iti |
GR14krdipc_u:1103: sthity-anto gṛhamedhiṣu sṛṣṭy-anto varṇinām iti prāhuḥ // Krd_2.34 //
GR14krdipc_u:1104: ayaṃ nyāsaḥ maskari-vaikhānaseṣu saṃhārānto vihitaḥ maskarī sannyāsī vaikhānaso vānaprasthaḥ, tathā tābhyāṃ nyāsa-trayaṃ kāryam ity arthaḥ |
GR14krdipc_u:1105: gṛha-medhiṣu gṛhastheṣu ayaṃ nyāsaḥ sthity-anto vihitaḥ |
GR14krdipc_u:1106: tathā gṛhasthaiḥ pañca nyāsāḥ kāryā ity arthaḥ |
GR14krdipc_u:1109: tathā ca brahmacāribhir nyāsa-catuṣṭayaṃ kāryam ity arthaḥ |
GR14krdipc_u:1110: iti pūrvoktam artha-jātaṃ prāhuḥ prācīnā āgamajñā iti śeṣaḥ ||
GR14krdipc_u:1112: vairāgya-yuji gṛhasthe saṃhāraṃ kecid āhur ācāryāḥ |
GR14krdipc_u:1113: sahajānau vana-vāsini sthitiṃ ca vidyārthināṃ sṛṣṭim // Krd_2.35 //
GR14krdipc_u:1114: kecid ācāryāḥ vairāgya-yukta-gṛhasthe saṃhārāntaṃ nyāsam āhuḥ |
GR14krdipc_u:1115: kiṃ ca sahajānau vana-vāsini sapatnīke sthitiṃ sthity-antaṃ nyāsam āhuḥ |
GR14krdipc_u:1117: brahmacāri-bhinnānāṃ vidyārthinām api sṛṣṭim sṛṣṭy-antaṃ nyāsam āhur ity
GR14krdipc_u:1120: śirasi vihitā madhyā saivākṣṇi tarjanikānvitā śravasi rahitāṅguṣṭhā jyeṣṭhānvitoṣakaniṣṭhakā
GR14krdipc_u:1121: nasi ca vadane sarvāḥ sajyāyasī hṛdi tarjanī
GR14krdipc_u:1122: prathamaja-yutā madhyā nābhau śravo-vihitā śive // Krd_2.36 //
GR14krdipc_u:1123: tā evāṅgulayo jānvoḥ sāṅguṣṭhās tu pada-dvaye |
GR14krdipc_u:1124: sthānārṇayor vinimayo bhaven nāsty aṅguli-sthānayoḥ // Krd_2.37 //
GR14krdipc_u:1125: madhyā madhyāṅguliḥ śirasi mūrdhni vihitā nyāsa-karaṇatvena tathā madhyāṅgulyā nyāsaḥ śirasi kārya ity arthaḥ |
GR14krdipc_u:1135: nābhau jaṭhare nābhi-padena jaṭharam upalakṣitam iti vidyādharaḥ |
GR14krdipc_u:1139: śive liṅge tathā vihitā yathā jaṭhare sāṅguṣṭhā madhyā tathety artha iti kecit |
GR14krdipc_u:1140: śravo vihitā śiva iti pāṭhe śrotra-yugale yā
GR14krdipc_u:1141: aṅguṣṭha-rahitās tāḥ śive vihitā ity arthaḥ |
GR14krdipc_u:1142: jānvos tā evāṅgulayaḥ aṅguṣṭhena rahitāḥ sarvāṅgulaya ity arthaḥ |
GR14krdipc_u:1144: sthānārṇayor ity ādinā sthānaākṣaraayor vinimayo viparyayo bhavati |
GR14krdipc_u:1149: kintu sṛṣṭau sthitau saṃhṛtau vā yatra sthāne yāṅgulir vihitā tayaivāṅgulyā tatra stāne nyāsaḥ kārya ity arthaḥ |
GR14krdipc_u:1153: aparaṃ bhūty-abhidhaṃ bhūtir iti nāma yasya tad bhūti-nāmakaṃ vacmi kathayāmi |
GR14krdipc_u:1164: tat-prācyādi-diśāsu mūrdhni sakale doṣṇoś ca sakthnos tathā // Krd_2.39 //
GR14krdipc_u:1173: kandharā ghāṭā kandharā kaṇṭha iti laghu-dīpikā-kāraḥ |
GR14krdipc_u:1187: na iti nāsikā-dvayaṃ kapola-dvayam eteṣu tṛtīyā vṛttiḥ |
GR14krdipc_u:1193: iti pakṣa-dvayaṃ ca vidyādharas tu karayor ekā vṛttiḥ, pādayor ekā vṛttir ity āha |
GR14krdipc_u:1201: ata eva hasta-pādayor nyāsa-catuṣṭayam iti tripāṭhinaḥ |
GR14krdipc_u:1204: mastake prādakṣiṇyena vyāpakatayā doṣṇoś ca bāhu-yuge tathā sakthnor ūru-mūlasyādhiṣṭhānayor madhya-pradeśayor eteṣv aṣṭamā vṛttiḥ |
GR14krdipc_u:1220: prapad iti pāda-yugalaṃ teṣu, eteṣu navamāvṛttiḥ |
GR14krdipc_u:1230: ittham anena prakāreṇa manūtthān mantra-sambandhino varṇān nyaset |
GR14krdipc_u:1231: prayogaś ca - goṃ namo mūlādhāre, pīṃ namaḥ liṅge, jaṃ namaḥ nābhau ity ādi || KrdC_2.39-40
GR14krdipc_u:1246: athānantaram asya daśākṣara-mantrasya sphūrtaye uddīpanāya mūrti-pañjaraṃ
GR14krdipc_u:1249: graho graha-janitam aśubhaṃ viṣaṃ sthāvaraṃ jaṅgamaṃ ca |
GR14krdipc_u:1262: keśavādibhiḥ pūrvokta-yuga-ṣaṭka-mūrtibhiḥ saha dhātṛ-pūrva-mihirās tān krameṇa nyasatu |
GR14krdipc_u:1270: prayogas tu oṃ aṃ oṃ keśava-dhātṛbhyāṃ namaḥ |
GR14krdipc_u:1276: vāma-traya-pṛṣṭha-kakutsu tathā mūrdhany anu ṣaḍ-yuga-varṇa-manum // Krd_2.44 //
GR14krdipc_u:1281: vāmetare vāmād itarad dakṣiṇaṃ dakṣiṇa-pārśve bhujānte gale ceti |
GR14krdipc_u:1292: audhasyaṃ suvimala-pāyasīva siktaṃ vyāpnoti prakaṭita-mantra-varṇa-kīrṇam // Krd_2.45 //
GR14krdipc_u:1293: sa prasiddho vāsudevo mūrdhastho mastaka-sthaḥ san vapur akhilaṃ samastaṃ vapuḥ śarīraṃ vyāpnoti sva-tejasety arthaḥ |
GR14krdipc_u:1295: caitanyāmṛtaṃ tad eva vapur yasya sa tathā |
GR14krdipc_u:1297: amṛtaṃ mokṣas tad eva vapur yasya sa tathā |
GR14krdipc_u:1301: prakaṭitā ye mantra-varṇā dvādaśākṣarodgatās tair ākīrṇaṃ vyāptam |
GR14krdipc_u:1302: kim iva ? suvimala-pāyasi sunirmale jale siktaṃ nikṣiptam audhasyaṃ dugdham
GR14krdipc_u:1309: mūrti-pañjarasya pūrva-kṛtyaṃ darśayati sṛṣṭi-sthitītyādi iti rudradharaḥ |
GR14krdipc_u:1312: mūrdhany akṣṇor ity ādinā pūrvam ukte sṛṣṭi-sthitī punaḥ sva-dehe vinyasya tathā daśa-pañcāṅga-yugmaṃ
GR14krdipc_u:1315: vakṣyamāṇa-mudrāṃ grathayitvā baddhvā bhūyaḥ punar api diśāṃ
GR14krdipc_u:1317: oṃ sudarśanāyāstrāya phaṭ ity anena vakṣyamāṇena mantreṇety arthaḥ || KrdC_2.46 ||
GR14krdipc_u:1319: tāraṃ hārdaṃ viśva-mūrtiś ca śārṅgī māṃsāntas te vāya-madhye sudevāḥ |
GR14krdipc_u:1320: ṣaḍ-dvandvārṇo mantra-varyaḥ sa uktaḥ sākṣād dvāraṃ mokṣa-puryāḥ sugamyam // Krd_2.47 //
GR14krdipc_u:1331: tathā ca oṃ namo bhagavate vāsudevāyeti prasiddhaḥ ṣaḍ-dvandvārṇo mantra-varyo dvādaśākṣaro mantra-śreṣṭha uktaḥ kathitaḥ |
GR14krdipc_u:1332: kīdṛśaḥ ? mokṣa-puryāḥ sākṣād avyavadhānena sugamyaṃ dvāraṃ sugama upāya ity arthaḥ || KrdC_2.47
GR14krdipc_u:1335: pūṣāhvaya-parjanyau tvaṣṭā viṣṇuś ca bhānavaḥ proktāḥ // Krd_2.48 //
GR14krdipc_u:1336: dhātā aryamā mitraḥ varuṇaḥ aṃśuḥ bhagaḥ vivasvān indraḥ pūṣāḥ parjanyaḥ tvaṣṭā viṣṇur ete dvādaśa bhānavaḥ kathitāḥ || KrdC_2.48 ||
GR14krdipc_u:1338: atha tu yuga-randhrārṇasyāhaṃ manor nyasanaṃ bruve
GR14krdipc_u:1340: tanum anu manuṃ vyāpayyātha triśaḥ praṇavaṃ sakṛn manujalipayo nyāsyā bhūyaḥ padāni ca sādaram anantaraṃ punar yuga-randhrārṇasya yuga-randhre rāja-dantatvād
GR14krdipc_u:1345: tathā cāṣṭādaśākṣarasya manor mantrasyāhaṃ nyasanaṃ nyāsaṃ bruve kathayāmīti pratijñā |
GR14krdipc_u:1347: aṅguli-pañcake pañcāṅgaṃ pūrvoktaṃ mantrākṣaraiḥ parikptaṃ kara-nyāsaṃ
GR14krdipc_u:1350: athānantaraṃ tanum anu lakṣyīkṛtya triśaḥ tri-vāraṃ mantraṃ vyāpayya vyāpakatayā vinyasya punaḥ praṇavaṃ sakṛd eka-vāraṃ vinyasya anantaraṃ manuja-lipayo nyāsyā mantrākṣarāṇi nyasatu bhūyo 'nantaraṃ sādaraṃ yathā syād evaṃ padāni pañca padāni nyāsyāni || KrdC_2.49 ||
GR14krdipc_u:1354: nyasatu śitadhīrjānvaṅghryor akṣarān śirasi dhruvaṃ nayana-mukha-hṛd-guhyāṅghriṣv arpayet pada-pañcakam // Krd_2.50 //
GR14krdipc_u:1357: bhrū-madhye śravaṇākṣṇor yugale no nāsikā-yugale ca |
GR14krdipc_u:1358: vadane grīvāyāṃ hṛdi nābhau kaṭy-ubhaye vāma-kaṭir dakṣiṇa-kaṭiś ca |
GR14krdipc_u:1360: eteṣu tathā jāvy-aṅghryoś ca śitadhir nirmala-matiḥ
GR14krdipc_u:1366: nayana-yugalaṃ mukhaṃ hṛdayaṃ guhyaṃ aṅghriś ca - eteṣu mantra-sambandhi pada-pañcakaṃ klīm ity ekam,
GR14krdipc_u:1369: pañcāṅgāni nyased bhūyo muny-ādīn apy anyat sarvam |
GR14krdipc_u:1370: tulyaṃ pūrveṇātho vakṣye mudrā bandhyā manvor yāḥ syuḥ // Krd_2.51 //
GR14krdipc_u:1371: pañcāṅgāni bhūyaḥ punar api śarīre nyaset |
GR14krdipc_u:1373: anyat sarvaṃ keśavādi-jātaṃ pūrveṇa tulyaṃ samānam eva |
GR14krdipc_u:1375: daśa-tattvādi-nyāseṣu mantrasya dvir āvṛtti-viśeṣa iti laghu-dīpikā-kāraḥ
GR14krdipc_u:1376: | atho 'nantaraṃ manvor daśākṣarāṣṭādaśākṣarayor yā mudrā bandhyā bandhanīyāḥ syur bhaveyus tā mudrā vakṣye kathayāmi || KrdC_2.51 ||
GR14krdipc_u:1386: anaṅguṣṭhā aṅguṣṭha-rahitā ṛjavo 'vakrā hasta-śākhā hastāṅgulayo hṛdaye mudrā bhavet |
GR14krdipc_u:1387: śīrṣake ca śirasi tā eva mudrā jñeyāḥ |
GR14krdipc_u:1389: adho 'ṅguṣṭhā muṣṭiḥ adho 'ṅguṣṭho yasyāṃ muṣṭau evaṃ kṛtā muṣṭiḥ śikhāyāṃ
GR14krdipc_u:1395: nārācavad bāṇavad muṣṭyoddhato yo bāhus tasya yugmakaṃ dvayaṃ tasyāṅguṣṭha-tarjanībhyāṃ karaṇābhyām uditaḥ |
GR14krdipc_u:1397: daśa-dikṣu viṣaktaḥ vistīrṇaḥ yatra mantre 'kṣiṇī bhavataḥ netrāṅgam asti
GR14krdipc_u:1403: veṇu-mudreha kathitā suguptā preyasī hareḥ // Krd_2.55 //
GR14krdipc_u:1406: yā kaniṣṭhikā pañcamī aṅgulī sā dakṣiṇāṅguṣṭha-saṃyuktā
GR14krdipc_u:1412: ittham iha śāstre veṇu-mudrā kathitā suguptā granthāntare 'tyanta-guptā |
GR14krdipc_u:1425: vāma-kaniṣṭhikayā dakṣiṇa-kaniṣṭhikāṃ niṣpīḍya vāmānāmikayā dakṣiṇa-tarjanīṃ niṣpīḍya śiṣṭa-vāmāṅgulī-trayam upari kṛtvā vāma-tarjanī-sahita-dakṣiṇa-hastāṅguli-traya-mukham ekatra yojayed eṣā
GR14krdipc_u:1428: aṅguṣṭhaṃ vāmam uddaṇḍitam itara-karāṅguṣṭakenātha baddhvā tasyāgraṃ pīḍayitvāṅgulibhir api tathā vāma-hastāṅgulibhiḥ |
GR14krdipc_u:1429: baddhvā gāḍhaṃ hṛdi sthāpayatu vimala-dhīr vyāharan māra-bījaṃ

GR14krdipc_u:6170: kiṃ ca, idam api mahac citraṃ yat sarasija-nilayā lakṣmīḥ vācām adhīśā sarasvatī ca svābhāvikīm asūyāṃ tyaktvā nityam enaṃ sādhaka-śreṣṭhaṃ sevete || KrdC_8.93 ||

GR14krdipc_u:6198: yogī yuñjīta yogān samucita-vihṛti-svapna-bodhā hṛtiḥ syāt prāgāsyaś cāsane sve sumṛduni samukhaṃ mīlitākṣo niviṣṭaḥ // Krd_8.97 //

GR14krdipc_u:6347: dhatte dīpta-navena śobhanam aghāpetātta-māyaṃ dhruvaṃ vande kāya-vimardanaṃ vadha-kṛtāṃ bhuñjad-dyukaṃ yādavam // Krd_8.116 //

GR14krdipc_u:6358: kiṃ bhūtaṃ kṛṣṇam ? pāpa-rahitaṃ svīkṛta-māyaṃ punar dhruvam avināśinaṃ punar vadha-kṛtām upadrava-kāriṇāṃ kāya-vimardanaṃ
